# polytomic_amplitude_connection (Resource)

Amplitude Connection

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "polytomic_amplitude_connection" "amplitude" {
  name = "example"
  configuration = {
    api_key    = "my-api-key"
    secret_key = "my-secret-key"
  }
}
```

- `id` (String) Amplitude Connection identifier
